method: In a mixing bowl, combine flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
Add milk and laughter to the dry ingredients and mix until smooth.
Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat.
Pour pancake batter onto the pan, using about 1/4 cup for each pancake.
Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook until golden brown.
Stack the smiling pancakes and serve with a dollop of laughter on top!
